Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.controller.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Created by Davide on 26/05/2017. This class represents a game room. The room is created with the first user
